body_html: I don't know much about Cuda memory, maybe @michaelisard @yuefengz or @zheng-xq would know more. I do know that there is an allocator member of the context but it doesn't look like it is exposed. Perhaps rewriting as Struct of Arrays instead of Array of Structs would be both more aligned with our APIs and faster?
